summary: This is an email from Google's Legal Investigations Support team acknowledging receipt of a legal preservation request related to case number 7-8674000024450. The email instructs the requester to use Google's Law Enforcement Request System (LERS) for future legal process submissions.

events.title: Google acknowledges legal preservation request
events.description: Google's Legal Investigations Support team sends an email confirming receipt of a legal preservation request and directs future submissions to their Law Enforcement Request System (LERS).

keyFacts: Google received a legal preservation request related to case number 7-8674000024450.
Google directed the requester to use their Law Enforcement Request System (LERS) for future legal process submissions.
The email indicates Google was phasing out email aliases for service of legal process in favor of their LERS system.
